name: Soapy
description:
Soapy was developed for my partner who loves Bubble Shooter but does not trust Flash anymore.

The game adjusts to screen size. We can play it on touch screen and mouse. Click on the screen where you want to the next bubble to shoot. 

I know, the players who love the skilled shooting to places would like maybe more challenges. My partner wanted a chill out game where puzzle is the key component and skill is when you bounce the ball off the walls.

I will be making changes to the game based on feedback. Let me know when you find bugs, hopes or anything at all :]

I am working for the second version with power ups and far on the horizon is a two player battle championships league. All donations are going to building the second version and ultimately the league. 

I can not yet promise what it's going to be and will there be anything. I am also validating the game play based on popularity and traffic it gets. Please, share it with your friends and know-maybes when you like it.

Thank you for reading.

- Flutterby
